plot outline: Jency and Ganesh love each other, but she has to get married to Nicholas, a rich entrepreneur from London. He had financed her mother's surgery, so in gratitude, Jency agrees to marry him.
title: Urchagam
plot: Jency and Ganesh love each other, but she has to get married to Nicholas, a rich entrepreneur from London. He had financed her mother's surgery, so in gratitude, Jency agrees to marry him.
